andisKim Jong-un is a member of the workers political party of Korea and supreme leader of North Korea. He was born on January 8, 1983 in Pyongyang, Korea. Kim Jong-un is the alumni of Kim Il-sung University and Kim Il-sung Military University. He was rewarded with honorary doctorate of economics by University of Malaysia. He has married with Ri Sol-ju. Kim has been worked as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission from 2010 to 2012. The address and contact number of Kim Jong Un is also used forand. Mr. David Newell

Excuse me if impertinence is projected on my comments, it is not intended. I am of the sincere opinion that "we are all one" in the essence of our being. Nothing can detract from the reality of what we are no ill conceived "jokes" or insults, or aggrandizing blandishments. Therefore, then, reacting to them only makes the intensity greater:
let the wave pass, without reinforcement. Nothing can be suppressed, for long:
without growing teeth and becoming larger. Therefore, then, (again) "do what is right", and be at peace. All will be as it should. Thank you.

Do isha shum i lumtur sikur ta vizitoja vendin tuaj. Nga qe dhe tek ne kemi pasur te njejtin sitem jete vite me par. Un personalisht nuk e kam jetuar. Por te paret e mi thojne se ka qen shum bukur.
Do me pelqente ta vizitoja vendin tuaj me shum kenaqesi.
Ju falenderoj perzemersisht per lejimit te kontaktimit me ju. Falemintderit shum
Me respekt

Agim bajraktari.

Adres.
